content.raw: Could you move this table to the `docs/installation/installation.rst`? I feel that it should go at the end of the first paragraph under `Installation`. See [here](http://ignition-transport.readthedocs.io/en/default/installation/installation.html) how the documentation looks like. Keep in mind that this is reStructuredText instead of markdown. There's an example of a table in `docs/environment_variables/env_variables.rst`.
